title: Health officials to give update, Trudeau urges Canadians to stay at home: The latest on COVID-19 in B.C.
description: Provincial health officer Dr. Bonnie Henry and Health Minister Adrian Dix are scheduled to speak from Victoria at 10 a.m. PT. CBC News will livestream the conference.
content:
Health officials in B.C. are set to provide their next update on the spread of COVID-19 in the province.
Provincial health officer Dr. Bonnie Henry and Health Minister Adrian Dix are scheduled to speak from Victoria at 10 a.m. PT. CBC News will livestream th… [+1443 chars]
